snippet: Tuesday’s highlights from around the web include a feature on Facebook’s interest in artificial intelligence. Plus, a woman recounts her story of Uber’s surge pricing.
abstract: Tuesday’s highlights from around the web include a feature on Facebook’s interest in artificial intelligence. Plus, a woman recounts her story of Uber’s surge pricing.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Facebook's Robot Philosopher, and the $357 Uber Ride
